named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCT_CUSTOMER_XREF_BY_CUSTOMERID
named-query.query: SELECT productCustomerXref FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.ProductCustomerXref productCustomerXref WHERE productCustomerXref.customer.id = :customerId

named-query.name: BC_READ_CUSTOMERS_XREF_BY_ORDER_NUMBER
named-query.query: SELECT productCustomerXref FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.ProductCustomerXref productCustomerXref WHERE productCustomerXref.product.id IN (SELECT discreteOrderItem.product.id FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.OrderItem orderItem, org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.DiscreteOrderItem discreteOrderItem WHERE discreteOrderItem.id = orderItem.id AND orderItem.order = :order)
